description: This Java source file defines the class DeviceIsChildRequest, which represents a request to check if a device is a child device in the Zigbee network simulation. It extends the Request class and implements the execute method to perform the check and send a response.

classes.name: DeviceIsChildRequest
classes.description: A request class for checking whether a device is a child device in the Zigbee network simulation.

methods.name: DeviceIsChildRequest
methods.description: Constructor that initializes the request with a request ID and the device EUI64.

methods.name: execute
methods.description: Performs the check to determine if the specified device is a child device and sends an appropriate response.
